staxel.village.dialogue.NerdPrimary.line: Hey ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! How are things?
Did you hear that there's some big exec on the island right now?
I...may have convinced a big game company to send someone out to pitch an idea...
Do...do you think you could go and speak to them for me?
Why don't you?
He uh... Well, let's just say he's threatened to take out a restraining order...
I might have been a little bit too persistent with my last pitch...
He goes home at the end of the day! Please, just pitch him this...
...and I'm sure he'll love it this time! When he does, get him to sign this for me!
That should seal the deal nicely!
He's back, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
You should hurry on over! I'd rather not have to try and convince them again...
Ah. You couldn't find him in time?
Well...not to worry. I think I can convince them to send him back in a few days...
But perhaps not too many times! Let's not get this island blacklisted!
Did you pitch my game yet, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
Hurry! There's not much time left!
So that's what he said?
I suppose it's a step up from my previous attempts!
Thanks a lot, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I know this isn't much, but I hope it'll at least express some of my gratitude!
I'll let you know when I've put together a better plan of action!
This is it ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I think I have it!
I know what to do to impress that executive.
Over the past few days I've invested mili-
-a lot of money into developing an ingenious new AR game!
You know, augmented reality - bringing the game into the real world!
And guess what, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, it's your lucky day; you get to try the alpha!
Now what you need to do is take these ^c:d03e37;two devices^c:pop; and go catch some monsters!
You'll find them in the world, hanging around on plants, or maybe even in the rivers!
But remember - your normal ^c:d03e37;bug net^c:pop; isn't going to work on these - they're not really there!
Same goes for the ^c:d03e37;fishing rod^c:pop;!
Come back when you've caught 'em all!
Hmm... It looks like you're still missing a few.
I think there are still ^c:d03e37;{0-LQuest_FishCount}^c:pop; in the ^c:1486b0;water^c:pop; and ^c:d03e37;{1-LQuest_BugCount}^c:pop; on ^c:1486b0;land^c:pop;.
I can't really get good stats on performance unless you catch every single one!
Wow, that was faster than I expected!
Have you done this before, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
Looks like it playtested pretty well - no major bugs to speak of!
Well... Except for that one strange glitch I suppose...
How did it feel to you?
It was great!
Well... There are a few-
Fantastic! I'm happy to hear that! I'll get started on the pitch right away!
Here, take these as a thank you!
Just a sample of the merch we're planning - have to get a head start before things take off, you know?
Now I just need to fly on over to show this stuff off to the people in charge!
This is going to be an exciting time, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Really exciting!
Hi ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I have some exciting news!
I managed to get a preliminary contract to begin opening an arcade to showcase some games!
There's just one small problem...
Contractors around here aren't the most...reliable, as I'm sure you know!
You've helped me out of some pretty tight situations in the past. I can count on you right?
Of course!
Maybe another time.
Yes! That's just what I wanted to hear!
This ^c:d03e37;sign^c:pop; needs to go front and centre so everyone knows what it is!
The ^c:d03e37;game cabinets^c:pop; are probably the most important part of the setup.
Make sure you don't forget them!
Oh. Well do let me know if you change your mind.
Brilliant, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! This is perfect!
I'll get the first of our new games installed immediately!
How about you head over and give it a try?
I'll give you something pretty special if you can beat the initial high score!
How's things going, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
It looks like you're not quite done yet, but progress is encouraging!
How's it going with beating the score on that ^c:d03e37;cabinet^c:pop;?
If you haven't given it a shot yet, just head over to the ^c:1486b0;arcade^c:pop; and you'll find it easily!
Oh, nice! That was quicker than I expected!
Don't worry though - I have even bigger things planned!
But we'll get to that soon enough...
We may have received the preliminary contract, but there's still some work to be done to formalise it.
I'm sure I'll be needing your help again soon enough!
Oh good, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, you arrived just in time!
That executive is back and it seems like he's brought someone with him...
I think this might be the final battle, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
We absolutely have to win this!
Come with me!
We absolutely have to win this!
You won't believe this, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, but they've decided to fully endorse my projects!
Hm? Oh, ^c:1486b0;Damian^c:pop;. Yeah, he is a bit intense, isn't he?
I suspect he got a bit worse when I moved away...
Maybe he'll calm down a bit now that someone beat him at his own game!
I do admit I'm pretty interested in getting that game in our ^c:1486b0;arcade^c:pop; though...
I wonder if I can convince him to let us host it?
But anyway... That's for later! We had a nice chat over here while you were gone.
I'm really not sure how to thank you enough - I don't doubt that you had a huge hand in making this possible!
This isn't much, but you're also welcome to come by the ^c:1486b0;arcade^c:pop; any time!
I have a feeling we'll be seeing a lot more of a certain someone in future...
